licenseText:
Copyright 1993 by OpenVision Technologies, Inc.

Permission to use, copy, modify, distribute, and sell this software
and its documentation for any purpose is hereby granted without fee,
provided that the above copyright notice appears in all copies and

in advertising or publicity pertaining to distribution of the software
without specific, written prior permission. OpenVision makes no
representations about the suitability of this software for any
purpose.  It is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.

OPENVISION DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES WITH REGARD TO THIS SOFTWARE,
INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS, IN NO
EVENT SHALL OPENVISION BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR
CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM LOSS OF
USE, DATA OR PROFITS, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE OR
OTHER TORTIOUS ACTION, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR
PERFORMANCE OF THIS SOFTWARE.

<<var;name="copyright";original="<copyright notice>";match=".{0,1000}">>

Permission to use, copy, modify, distribute, and sell this software and its documentation for any purpose is hereby granted without fee, provided that the above copyright notice appears in all copies<<beginOptional>>, <<endOptional>><<beginOptional>> and<<endOptional>> that both<<beginOptional>> that<<endOptional>><<beginOptional>> the<<endOptional>> copyright notice and this permission notice appear in supporting documentation<<beginOptional>>, and that the name<<beginOptional>> of<<endOptional>> <<var;name="copyrightHolder0";original="<copyright holder>";match=".*">> <<var;name="orRelated";original="<or related entities>";match=".*">> not be used in advertising or publicity pertaining to distribution of the software without specific, written prior permission <<endOptional>> .<<beginOptional>> <<var;name="copyrightHolder1";original="<copyright holder>";match=".*">> makes no representations about the suitability of this software for any purpose. It is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.<<endOptional>><<beginOptional>> <<var;name="copyrightHolder2";original="<copyright holder>";match=".*">> DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES WITH REGARD TO THIS SOFTWARE, INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS <<var;name="period";original=".";match="[.,]?">> IN NO EVENT SHALL <<var;name="copyrightHolder3";original="<copyright holder>";match=".*">> BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM LOSS OF USE, DATA OR PROFITS, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE OR OTHER TORTIOUS ACTION, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS SOFTWARE.<<endOptional>>
name: Historical Permission Notice and Disclaimer - sell variant
licenseComments: This license is a variant of HPND (https://spdx.org/licenses/HPND.html). This variant explicitly includes the permission to "sell" the software, which is not explicitly referenced in the HPND template, and makes a few other minor changes. It otherwise retains the optional templated formatting from HPND.
